course_title: Topics in Afr American Studies: African Diaspora in Americas
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 3Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course is an interdisciplinary survey and analysis of the formation of Atlantic African identities, cultures, and societies in the Western Hemisphere since the 16th century.
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, social and literary texts, and the social sciences.
sections: Class Nbr: 1941, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: W. Rucker, Status: Open
